name: Kajal
about: I come from a middle-class family. The most important thing in my life is religious beliefs, moral values & respect for elders. I'm an easy-going, sincere,  caring person with a strong work ethic. I'm a modern thinker and follow good values given by our ancestors. I like Painting, love traveling with friends, writing, listening to classical music & watching the latest movies.

name: Gayathri
about: I belong to a well-mannered middle-class family and strongly believe in Hindu culture, rituals & holds an open-minded personality. I'm a pure vegetarian and never not drank or smoked. I'm Affectionate, kind-hearted, Caring, Happy & belives in Hard Working and creativity. My hobbies are Reading, Dancing, Watch Online Documentaries and Learn New Things.

name: Pallavi
about: I'd describe myself as someone who's reliable, trendy, smart and someone who always has a smile on the face. I am a big Nature & Animal lover. I have lived in different parts of India and appreciate all cultures & customs. Looking forward to exploring more with someone of my age. I have always enjoyed and loved the company of my parents.

name: Derishna
about: I'm an easy-going, god-fearing, caring, polite, understanding, reliable, and kind-hearted human being. I consider within the motto Live and let live. I hate liars. I'm fun-loving, down earth, and really a lot Optimist. I like touring, sightseeing, listening to rock music, studying all the most recent fiction novels.

name: Ellakiya
about: I've at all times been an achiever be it teachers or skilled life or sports activities or every other area in my life. I consider in success by way of onerous work & dedication. I'm a progressive thinker & respect every particular person's area & values.
